name: Aelon Reglis
content:
Aelon Reglis was a gambler and family man from Chandrila.
Aelon Reglis was a gambler from the planet Chandrila. Wanting to live adventures among the stars, he bought the Adventurer, a Crescent-class transport Mark II built by Hyrotii Corporation. Soon after making the purchase, Reglis met a bureaucrat from Chandrila, fell in love with her, married her and had a child, Lynx. Reglis settled and, during the weekends, he sat on his parked ship to daydream.
Lynx Reglis eventually graduated in the Imperial Academy. Aelon gave her the Adventurer as a present, hoping she could get more profit from the ship that he did.
